name: Bow Shooter
description:
Like the archery? Now, you can enjoy this realistic archery sports game on Android. Play the best archery game in store now!

There are 2 game style to select. Each has 12 exciting levels with each level having 10 arrows.

It gets more challenging as the level advances. Depending on where the arrow lands on the target, you can get from 100 to 10 points. You will get more stars if you get higher score at the level. To become a archery master with 3 stars for each level, replay a level to improve your star number.

Click the coin, then click the free coin button on the new page to get free coins and get free new items. Unlock various achievements after completing the missions. Reach the TOP of Leaderboard to compete with friends.

With intuitive control and addictive levels, shoot the arrow to the bull's eye and enjoy this great archery sports game.
